description.value:
At the start of the day, a dragon can perform a 10-minute ritual to prepare themself for any fights they might have in the day ahead. The dragon chooses one of the following effects, which last for 24 hours.

  • Assured Fate (fortune) When the omen dragon rolls initiative, instead of rolling, they can choose to have a result equal to 13 + their initiative modifier.

    @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Assured Fate]

  • Instinctive Challenge During an encounter, the fortune dragon gains an additional reaction at the start of their turn that can be used only for Challenge Fate.
